name: Mini 4WD Hyper Dash Grand Prix
summary: Mini 4WD Hyper Dash Grand Prix is a mobile racing and customizing game developed by BANDAI. In the game, you are able to create your very own mini racer freely. You will be provided tons of machine parts to fine-tune your car, and then you can use it to race against other players. Besides, the sound effect of the game are all generated by real-life mini racer's machine sounds, and the manga characters of the original series will also make an appearance in the game.
